summary: Add\'s a disenchantable sword that freezes enemies solid
descriptionHtml:
*Requires Dragonborn*

Ice Blade is a Chillrend replica that can be found in dragonsreach on Farengar\'s desk (or nearby)
It is enchanted with Ice Block, a cross between the Ice form shout and Hoarfrost\'s enchantment but it will freeze enemies on every hit! And also do some additional Frost damage.
This can be disenchanted and placed on another weapon.
I thought Hoarfrost was lame as it had a really low chance to Freeze solid and it\'s a pickaxe! I love Chillrend but always thought the enchantment was lacking. This is not a replacer it simply adds a
sword that has identical stats to chillrend, the same look and FX as Chillrend but with a better enchantment.
The Frozen effect lasts for 5 seconds.
Enjoy

Please let me know if you have any problems.
I haven\'t tried it on a bow yet so let me know how it works out.
It would be awesome on a crossbow with frost bolts!
Also I know the name is very unimaginative let me know if you can think of a better one!

If you want to use anything feel free just name me but all I did was re-work the hoarfrost
enchantment to remove the low chance script it was something silly like 3%!
author: wilchie
